channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-1562] Add examples from the Tika in Action book
item.description: Manning publications has granted permission for me to contribute the Tika in Action code to Apache TIka. Yay! I'll put it in the examples module and update it if needed.
item.summary: Add examples from the Tika in Action book

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Also may I suggest adding chapter about case studies, to make sure that people know in what kind of situations they could use tika?

I've added a note about these to the end of the in-progress 1.9 examples page, but it'd be great if someone could include some of these as full-blown entries in the examples page. (Just needs a bit of a description, often inspired by the javadocs, and a magic include statement to pull the code into the page)

Thanks Nick! My current status is trying to finish up exposing the Translate API from the REST server, finishing up the first full working version of Tika-Python, and then I'll try and get back to this if no one beats me to it!
